name: Partigi
tag_list: friends, social, films, tv-shows, cultural-products, discover, recommendations, fun, easy, entertainment
description: Helps you choose your cultural products
overview:
Partigi is a tool to help you choose your next film and tv show. It’s and online notebook to keep track of films you have seen and want to see, to share it with your friends and to get recommendations and info. It gives you access to your friends favs and lets you discover interesting things to watch.

(we launch in october 10 with films, but we’ll be expanding to another categories in the near future)

Recommendations you can count on: Partigi aims to reduce your choice fatigue by giving you recommendations you can count on. If you are tired of self-proclaimed super-hits you’d be better following your friends advice, because they won’t try to sell you anything. Movie synopses and marketers only tell the good stuff, but your friends tell you the good, the bad and the ugly. Partigi make it easy to access your friends recommendations.

Your online notebook: Partigi lets you write down films you want to watch so you never forget a recommendation from a friend or which you read somewhere else. You keep a log of the films you have watched, writing short reviews or comments and rating films you have watched, for your memory and for your friends.

Helps you choose: Many times, choosing is a hassle. Too many options, too many opinions, too many sources where you can get information to make the best selection. Partigi gives you the best recommendations you can get, so you choose the best film you can watch.

All in an easy and timely manner: when you are going to rent a film, when you are at home deciding what to watch, when you are going to the movies… and letting you filter them by genre, mood, country, year. And Partigi not only relies on math and statistics to recommend you things, but also your friends’ likes and your taste proximity with them.

Track your friends’ favs: Besides writing down in your notebook a recommendation from a friend, with Partigi you don’t have to wait for incredible items to show up casually in conversations: you can have them at hand at any time. Its like a collective brain you can dig into in any moment. You can also chat and comment your friends’ reviews (“Jack, how in the world is it possible that you liked Wadus 2?”).

Always with you: Browse Partigi with your mobile from anywhere - quick and easy. Use our film database to check up on any facts and take note of a recommendation wherever it takes place - don’t wait to get home to note it down because we all know you’ll probably forget it :) Use Partigi to get ideas when you’re on the go with easy access to all your saved movies and lists.
